PMC Jurisdiction Over Fugitive Felon Cases
PMCs are responsible for processing
Form FFP-3
if the beneficiary whose award is subject to adjustment is
in receipt of pension or DIC, or
entitled to compensation but is receiving pension as the greater benefit.
